alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 15 at 6:19PM MST until July 15 at 7:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Arizona, including the following county, Yavapai. * WHEN...Until 930 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in creeks and normally dry washes is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 619 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Skull Valley Wash, Tonto Wash, Copper Basin Wash, Woolsey Wash, Granite Creek, Cooper Wash, Mint Wash, Miller Creek, Iron Springs Wash, Bottleneck Wash, Dillon Wash, Willow Creek, Butte Creek, Finch Wash, Logan Wash, Spence Creek and Strickland Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Prescott, Yavapai Campground, Iron Springs and Williamson Valley. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
